tool.color.name: Color
tool.wire.name: Wire
tool.wire.speaker.name: Speaker
tool.precision.name: Precision
tool.precision.ghost_instructions: Click to place, press USE to cancel
tool.precision.grab_mode: Precision mode: Click again to place
tool.fadingdoor.name: Fading Door
tool.fadingdoor.description: Adds a fading door to a prop
tool.fadingdoor.exists: Fading Door already exists, use reload to remove it
tool.scale.name: Scale
tool.scale.description: Scales props with factor or axis values
tool.scale.attack1: Apply scale to prop with factor
roleplay.job.citizen.name: Citizen
roleplay.job.citizen.description: An ordinary member of society with no specialized role.
roleplay.job.cook.name: Cook
roleplay.job.cook.description: Provides meals for the city's inhabitants. Can deploy a cooking station and sell food to others.
roleplay.job.gundealer.name: Gun Dealer
roleplay.job.gundealer.description: The exclusive provider of firearms in the city. Must operate carefully to avoid legal troubles when selling restricted weapons.
roleplay.job.hobo.name: Hobo
roleplay.job.hobo.description: A marginalized individual who survives by requesting assistance and constructing improvised shelters.
roleplay.job.medic.name: Medic
roleplay.job.medic.description: A healthcare professional who restores injured players to full health. Vital for maintaining citizens' wellbeing.
roleplay.job.theatremanager.name: Theatre Manager
roleplay.job.theatremanager.description: Runs the city's movie theater, screening films and selling tickets and concessions to citizens seeking entertainment.
roleplay.job.mobboss.name: Mob Boss
roleplay.job.mobboss.description: The leader of the city's criminal organization. Directs gangsters to establish an effective criminal enterprise.
roleplay.job.gangster.name: Gangster
roleplay.job.gangster.description: A low-ranking criminal who typically serves under the Mob Boss within the crime syndicate.
roleplay.job.thief.name: Thief
roleplay.job.thief.description: An expert criminal who specializes in burglary and stealing valuables. Works either solo or collaboratively.
roleplay.job.drugdealer.name: Drug Dealer
roleplay.job.drugdealer.description: Specializes in manufacturing and selling illicit substances.
roleplay.job.mayor.name: Mayor
roleplay.job.mayor.description: The city's elected leader responsible for ensuring public safety and overseeing the police department.
roleplay.job.policechief.name: Police Chief
roleplay.job.policechief.description: The commander of the police force who maintains law and order, coordinates enforcement activities, and protects citizens.
roleplay.job.policeofficer.name: Police Officer
roleplay.job.policeofficer.description: Executes directives from the Police Chief and Mayor to preserve peace and enforce regulations within the community.
roleplay.job.prisoner.name: Prisoner
roleplay.job.prisoner.description: An individual who has been detained by law enforcement and is serving time.
roleplay.group.civilian.name: Civilian
roleplay.group.criminal.name: Criminal
roleplay.group.government.name: Government
roleplay.group.other.name: Other
roleplay.group.public.name: Public
notify.prop.limit: You have reached your prop limit
notify.door.limit: You have reached your door limit
notify.job.full: Job is full, try another one
notify.job.prisoner: You cannot switch jobs while incarcerated
notify.job.playtime: You do not meet the playtime requirement for this job
notify.vote.limit: You have recently started a vote, please wait before trying again
notify.fadingdoor.breached: Fading Door is breached, use a Pry Bar to repair.
notify.suicide.limit: Please wait before trying to commit suicide again
notify.suicide.god: You are currently spawn protected, try again later
notify.playtime.limit.2h: You need 2 hours of playtime to do this
notify.playtime.limit.30m: You need 30 minutes of playtime to do this
notify.text.limit: You have hit your text limit
notify.frame.limit: You have hit your frame limit
notify.undo.none: You have no history to undo
notify.law.length: Law must be between 5 and 60 characters long.
notify.law.max: Maximum laws reached. Remove a law first.
notify.wanted.player.cooldown: This player has recently been wanted, please try again later
notify.customjob.set: Your custom job has been set
governance.laws.default.1: Weapons larger than a pistol are illegal
governance.lockdown.cooldown: You must wait before starting another lockdown
governance.lockdown.not_enough_police: Police officers required to start a lockdown
chat.system.mayordie: The mayor has been killed! Laws are now back to default.
chat.system.host: You are the host, abuse of this may result in a global ban.
consent.subtitle: Consent
privacy.title: Privacy Policy
consent.privacy.recording.disclosure: You must be 18+ to play this game. We record all text inputs, user actions, and voice interactions that occur while playing our game. These are used to improve our services, moderate, and ensure a respectful environment.
consent.privacy.data.collection.intro: We collect and store various user identifiers and activity data, including but not limited to:
consent.privacy.ai.moderation: We use third-party AI services provided by OpenAI to moderate content on our platform. User-generated content, messages, and interactions may be processed by OpenAI's systems to identify and address inappropriate content, ensure compliance with our community guidelines, and maintain a safe environment for all users.
consent.privacy.data.security: Your data is stored securely and is only used for the purposes of game functionality, service improvement, and community moderation. We do not sell your personal information to third parties.
consent.privacy.data.media: Screenshots captured with the in-game camera and shared via MMB are uploaded to our public Discord #media channel. These images are visible to all Discord members. You may request removal of your shared media at any time.
consent.privacy.contact.info: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at
generic.forbidden: You do not have permission to perform this action
generic.wait: You need to wait before trying again
generic.moderated: Your provided text has been flagged as inappropriate.
generic.reason: You must provide a valid reason.
